# Only review is a number (float64). Because of this i need to modify the data. Transform 'Price', 'Milage', 'Review_count' in number.

price=[]
milage = []
review_count = []

for i in data['Price($)']:
    x = i.replace(',','')
    p = int(x)
    price.append(p)

for i in data['Milage']:
    x = i.replace(',','')
    m = int(x)
    milage.append(m)
    
for i in data['Review_count']:
    x = i.replace(',','')
    r = int(x)
    review_count.append(r)
    


# Creating a new dataframe.
# I decide to drop, too, the feature 'Badge'. I don't know what is this

data_clean = pd.DataFrame({'name':data['Name'],'price':price, 'milage':milage,'review':data['Review'], 'review_count': review_count})
